log-files.description:
No Log-Files chosen yet.
Export Log-Files from Sierra Chart and upload them here.
Hint: Multiple selection possible. Hold down Ctrl when selecting.

authentication.headline-signup: Sign up to inloopo trading stats

password-reset.started-detail: We have sent you an email to reset your password.
password-reset.started-detail-2: Check your inbox to complete password reset process.
password-reset.label: Request password reset email
password-reset.description: You can request a password reset here.

email.invalid: Please enter a valid email address.

password.short: Your password is too short. Please enter 8 characters.

generic.file-input-required: Please select at least one file.
generic.trading-account-required-description: Please select/create a trading account before importing.

user.no-name-yet: You don't have a username yet.

accounts.created-date: This account has been created on {date}.
accounts.log-file-created-date: This log file import has been created on {date}.
accounts.log-file-count: Number of trades derived from this log file import: {count}
accounts.no-log-files: You have no log files at the moment.
accounts.clear-account-description: Clearing an account will delete all it's associated log files and trades imported from those files.
accounts.clear-account-confirm-question: Are you sure you want to clear this account? This will delete all data associated with this account.

public-dashboard.no-public-dashboard-headline: This trading account has no public dashboard!
public-dashboard.no-public-dashboard-hint: If you're the account owner: No worries, you can always make it public in your trading account settings.
public-dashboard.empty-public-dashboard-headline: This public dashboard has no trades yet!
public-dashboard.empty-public-dashboard-hint: Upload trades into your trading account and they will be displayed here automatically.

settings.description: You can publish your dashboard to share it with others. If made public, everyone can view your trading activity on {host}/{locale}/public/{accountId}/overview
